tasks.title: Create doc_engine package + ComponentDetector
tasks.description: Create the mahabharatha/doc_engine package with __init__.py and detector.py. ComponentDetector auto-detects component type (module, command, config, types, api) via AST analysis, file extension, and structural markers.
acceptance_criteria: Supports: module, command, config, types, api detection

verification.command: python -c "from mahabharatha.doc_engine.detector import ComponentDetector, ComponentType; print('OK')"

tasks.title: Create SymbolExtractor
tasks.description: AST-based symbol extraction: classes, functions, imports, docstrings, type definitions. Uses Python ast module to parse source files and extract structured symbol information.
acceptance_criteria: SymbolExtractor.extract(path) returns SymbolTable with classes, functions, imports

tasks.title: Create DependencyMapper
tasks.description: Import graph builder with reverse-import lookup. Crawls Python source files to build a directed graph of import relationships. Supports both forward (what does X import) and reverse (what imports X) queries.

tasks.title: Create MermaidGenerator
tasks.description: Generate Mermaid diagram syntax for: module dependency graphs, command workflow sequences, task lifecycle state machines, system data flow diagrams.

tasks.title: Create DocRenderer + templates
tasks.description: DocRenderer orchestrates detection -> extraction -> template rendering. Templates for module, command, config, types, api component types. Match existing MAHABHARATHA documentation style (tables, code blocks, progressive disclosure, no emoji).
acceptance_criteria: Templates for 5 component types: module, command, config, types, api
Templates use tables, code blocks, progressive disclosure

verification.command: python -c "from mahabharatha.doc_engine.renderer import DocRenderer; from mahabharatha.doc_engine.templates import TEMPLATES; print('OK')"

tasks.title: Create CrossRefBuilder
tasks.description: Cross-reference system: glossary term extraction from codebase, wiki link injection into generated docs, 'See also' section generation based on import relationships and topic similarity.

tasks.title: Create SidebarGenerator
tasks.description: Generate GitHub Wiki _Sidebar.md from page hierarchy. Groups pages by section (Getting Started, Command Reference, Architecture, etc.) with proper indentation and linking.
acceptance_criteria: Pages grouped by section with proper hierarchy
Links use GitHub Wiki format [[Page Name]]

tasks.title: Create /z:document command file
tasks.description: Create mahabharatha:document.md slash command file. Usage: /z:document <target> [--type auto|module|command|config|api|types] [--output PATH] [--depth shallow|standard|deep] [--update]. Includes Task tracking (TaskCreate/TaskUpdate).
acceptance_criteria: Command file follows existing MAHABHARATHA command style
Documents all flags and usage examples

tasks.title: Create /z:index command file
tasks.description: Create mahabharatha:index.md slash command file. Usage: /z:index [--full] [--push] [--dry-run] [--output .mahabharatha/wiki/]. Includes Task tracking. Drives full wiki generation pipeline.
acceptance_criteria: Command file follows existing MAHABHARATHA command style

tasks.title: Create WikiPublisher
tasks.description: WikiPublisher handles git clone/push to {repo}.wiki.git. Clones wiki repo, copies generated pages, commits and pushes. Supports --dry-run mode.

tasks.title: Register document CLI command
tasks.description: Create mahabharatha/commands/document.py with Click command. Register in mahabharatha/commands/__init__.py and mahabharatha/cli.py. Command: mahabharatha document <target> [options].

tasks.title: Register index/wiki CLI command
tasks.description: Create mahabharatha/commands/wiki.py with Click command. Register in mahabharatha/commands/__init__.py and mahabharatha/cli.py. Command: mahabharatha wiki [options].

tasks.title: Create symlinks (z:document, z:index)
tasks.description: Run mahabharatha install-commands --force to create /z:document and /z:index symlinks in .claude/commands/.

verification.command: python -m mahabharatha install-commands --force 2>&1 | tail -5 && test -L .claude/commands/z:document.md && test -L .claude/commands/z:index.md && echo OK
